resources.string:
Author: Raffaele Di Nardo Di Maio \n This application shows some of the photos, made by Raffaele. \n It\'s organized in themes and shows the best photos on the movies. If you want to see other applications, programmed by the author, you can visit:\n\n https://github.com/RaffaDNDM \n There you can find some programs about:\n
Machine Learning
Big Data
Operating System
Parallel Computing
CTF solutions
Application of geometry concepts
